solution_line_template: So he treats {patients_first_hospital}+{extra_patients}=<<{patients_first_hospital}+{extra_patients}={patients_second_hospital}>>{patients_second_hospital} patients at the second hospital
So he treats {patients_first_hospital}+{patients_second_hospital}=<<{patients_first_hospital}+{patients_second_hospital}={total_patients_per_day}>>{total_patients_per_day} patients a day
That means he treats {total_patients_per_day}*{work_days_per_week}=<<{total_patients_per_day}*{work_days_per_week}={total_patients_per_week}>>{total_patients_per_week} patients a week
So he treats {total_patients_per_week}*{work_weeks_per_year}=<<{total_patients_per_week}*{work_weeks_per_year}={total_patients_per_year}>>{total_patients_per_year} patients a year
